column4: Two things. 1) Will I have any incompatibility issues in switching from Gutsy 32bit to Gutsy 64bit? And 2) Why does the video playback on my Ubuntu seem to darken quite a bit after a while of using it?
1) Yes, Flash and Java don't work as well in 64bit 2) No idea
ah, thank you =] I kinda figured there would be some downfall to using 64bit. I guess I'll stick with 32. Thanks for your time =]
Setting no password isn't going to make you more susceptible to viruses or other malware, but it'll make it trivial for an attacker to break into your system
